topic.title: zeronet is pretty good
topic.body:
I first used ZN off and on a few years ago when it was released. Heard about it on the chins. Things seem much smoother now. Going to try and use it daily but there isn't much traffic. Thinking about taking my configuration notes for my ZN gateway and making it into a freenas plugin to get more people into it.

How long have you all been using zeronet?

Jewish critics and antisocialist wich wanted a free america are all dead on the titanic wich exploded because the engine was a ticking bomb, the jews controlls media and the bank, the holcaust was a lie to give the jews more rights and prevent the german to start the 3rd war

1560049831_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehE.body: Literally who? YT bans "far right" content because the messaging is effective. Only globohomo messaging is allowed within the left or the right.

> [nickwa](#comment_152_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehEEKKJj): They are basically banning anybody who is a threat to the media organizations like Vox and NYT. They are losing sales in cable, newspapers, and online subscriptions, so they are trying to make it up somehow.

It's more about controlling the message than any financial reason. Any "independent" media that operates outside of their predetermined dialectic (globohomo) gets throttled, banned, etc. As big of a disappointment as Trump's presidency has been, they fucked up big time when he got elected. This is just the natural course to keep that from ever happening again.

1561288542_14hmCEXpoVdYQqeve93LpieDx2k8a.body: Political dissidents. In the west you can have your whole lively hood taken away simply for noticing things and commenting on them. There is no shortage of news organizations and jurno's at work to find dissidents and expose them. Not only will they slander you and get you fired from your job you will also be banned from banks, payment processors, social media sites, web hosting, domain services, etc.

The West, as in western counties that you listed.

This is well past theory, my dude. Here is a couple of articles and way more on the web if you think this is just a "theory".

Antifa jurnos: https://quillette.com/2019/05/29/its-not-your-imagination-the-journalists-writing-about-antifa-are-often-their-cheerleaders/

Google and Godaddy: https://www.businessinsider.com/eff-google-daily-stormer-2017-8

1561376516_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_43_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): This is called ageist discrimination.   It's no different in principle than discrimination against racial minorities, women, or gays.  Grow up dude.

Listen, not all boomers are bad but that really isn't an argument. The fact that boomers were born with more than resources than any other generation and squandered it with no plan for the next generations is reason enough to get rid of them. They bought into all the jewish revolutionary marxist shit but then became yuppies when that sucked. They have had a good hand in destroying the west and they don't possess the introspect to actually ask themselves why everything is fucked up.

Calling out the shortcomings of people/groups isn't about people that need to grow up. It must be done if we are to survive the future.

> [xcape2net](#comment_44_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): And what will you say when the next generation says that about your generation?  Every generation says they will fix the mistakes caused by the previous generation.  Since before the time of the ancient Greeks, everyone has been looking to build a utopia.  They've all failed.  Your generation will be no different.  Everything is "all fucked up" because people are people.  That isn't going to change any time soon.  Grow up and realize the truth in that.

And how does it help to not call people out on it or talk about it? How do we learn if everyone is ignorant?

We are at a point where lies are truths. For anyone with agency it is their duty to seek the truth.

> [holeyhouseofair](#comment_29_1CHaf5xV3RY8BaoknhfQBNKAYycPwjjc57): hey whitewolf, are you joe? this is charly

Hey charly, long time never talk.

> [xcape2net](#comment_51_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): I do support free speech.  I'm just saying that there is productive free speech, and there is nonproductive free speech.  Just like there are truths that can be spoken freely and lies that can be spoken freely.  I'm perfectly fine with you being free to say whatever you want any way you want, but if you start saying that we should get rid of all baby boomers, then I and many other people will stop listening to you.   So, do you want people to listen to you, or do you want to be ignored, or do you just not care? [...]

You think saying words like minorities, sexism, racism, etc are productive? My dude, these are words that make people hate. Think of the time, money, and quality of life that has been wasted on these words. I would say they are the black hole of productivity.

1561514363_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body:
The Georgia Guidestones:

    Maintain humanity under 500,000,000 in perpetual balance with nature.
    Guide reproduction wisely — improving fitness and diversity.
    Unite humanity with a living new language.
    Rule passion — faith — tradition — and all things with tempered reason.
    Protect people and nations with fair laws and just courts.
    Let all nations rule internally resolving external disputes in a world court.
    Avoid petty laws and useless officials.
    Balance personal rights with social duties.
    Prize truth — beauty — love — seeking harmony with the infinite.
    Be not a cancer on the earth — Leave room for nature — Leave room for nature.

1561515103_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4.body: Why would you want to moderate? Don't you like it when that one guy comes in and tells you to kill yourself?

1561578874_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body: I ordered the 4GB kit yesterday. They don't ship until August :(

> [leftside](#comment_803_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): Is there anyone or any forum that they got this item in hand now?I'd like to know the result of $ sudo cryptsetup benchmark.

Does the Pi 4 even have hardware crypto?

> [andax](#comment_14_1D8TYfuxwgwt6q3Qf5fKNDqFH1ztqJfZaH): The 4GB version is quite interesting. It is likely  that more common desktop linux distributions will officially run on raspberry pi 4 but i would suggest the system should be completely loaded into RAM at boot because SD cards are not good with read/write cycles (I.E. just as in puppy linux). I am curious if Pi4 could be used as a terminal server (something like LTSP.org ) to improve performance of an old laptop which has not much more than 1GB. I definitely would prefer 2 Ethernet instead of 2 HDMI for that. In such setting it could nicely host something like a tor gateway as well. And of couse a zeronet bundle! I heard  the GPU part stil relies on proprietary stuff anyway, but that way it would not really require it.

The SD performance is quite a bit better since the last gen. Agreed about dropping the extra mini hdmi for 2 ethernet. Looks like the nic can sustain around 936Mbps. Running pf, suricata, etc on a $35 device would be sick.

1562525339_1CeQt9V6HXQjKEipGLs6RSAYD8aLE.body:
Are you using a separate router or using a modem/router combo from your ISP? If your router doesn't have any configuration for IPv6 I would think about getting something a little more robust like ddwrt, opensense, etc.

Off topic: You in Hungary?  I would love to visit someday. Maybe even try and get citizenship since I can trace back ancestry.
